title: Homepage - Spirit Rock
description: Spirit Rock is a spiritual training institution grounded in the Buddha's teachings in order to manifest wisdom and compassion, for the benefit of all beings. Our mediation center is set among 411 acres of oak woodlands in the hills of Marin County, CA.
cleaned_text: PLEASE NOTE: Our website program registration system will be updated on Wednesday, September 13 from 12:45-1:30pm PT. If you want to register for a program, please register before or after this time period to ensure a successful registration. Thank you. Website registration will be down for updates on Sept. 13 from 12:45-1:30pm PT. Please register for programs before or after this time. Thank you.
